metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7684 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unrestricted file upload in GLPI before 0.85.3 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code by adding a file with an executable extension as an attachment to a new ticket, then accessing it via a direct request to the file in files/_tmp/.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
